name: Add new Airtable records to Google BigQuery
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically transferring records from Airtable to Google BigQuery. With this template, every time a new record is added in Airtable, Make will create a corresponding row in Google BigQuery, ensuring your data is always up-to-date and easily accessible for analysis. This integration helps you maintain a seamless workflow between your project management and data analytics tools, enhancing your team's productivity and decision-making capabilities.
